scenario_text.value: This...could be pretty bad.
Hmm, this is going to be a problem.
Kaito, Aoi? Is something bothering you?
Yes. Our food stores are starting to get low.

We have more mouths to feed now, right? So
our supply is being used up faster.

Makes sense. More people means we use more
ingredients each meal.

At this rate, our reserves are about to just
evaporate. What to do....

Right... Why don’t we see what we can find in
the forest?
In the forest? You know what to look for?

Sure. We can at least find some nuts, and I
grew up by the woods, so I know what’s safe.

I’ll take a look around a little later. We
can’t afford to run out of food.

Oh, then I should go with you. I’d like to
learn what’s safe to eat and what’s not.
In that case, I’ll come with...
You stay behind.
What? Why?

We got a buncha people to look after here.
Someone’s gotta stay behind for that.

Plus, I doubt Miu wants to leave the kiddies
to go rustle up some grub.

In other words, you want me to keep an eye on
things here?
Got it in one. It’s all you, man.
Huh, well... All right, if you insist.

(I guess we can leave our food shortage
problem to Aoi and Kaito for now.)
